author: abcoathup
content:
Ethereum Protocol Fellowship has done 5 cohorts with the latest just finished up.  Look out for it next year.
https://blog.ethereum.org/2024/05/13/epf-5-announcement
To start studying: https://epf.wiki

There is an internship program but this is aimed at people with less experience: https://blog.ethereum.org/2024/11/16/announcing-ef-internship-program

author: egtnice_47262
content: Thanks for sharing these resources!  The Ethereum Protocol Fellowship sounds like an amazing program—I’ll definitely take a closer look at the wiki and start exploring.  The internship program is interesting too;  even with experience, there’s always more to learn.  Appreciate the pointers!
